title: Question about provisionals
body: my game lagged in champion select and made me dodge will this count as a lose or im all good im currently 3-0 hopefully im not 3-1

replies.body:
It won't be on your account as a loss, HOWEVER, dodging will affect your placements as if you lost.

There is a long thread from last year taking about it. Also Riot confirmed it in a podcast linked in the thread. You still have to play 10 games no matter what before getting your rank, but the system recognises dodges as losses.

So for example, if you go 10-0 in your placements now, the system will actually have you as going 10-1 even though technically the 1 doesnt exist.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/3ETdh8cM-psa-no-matter-what-dont-dodge-games-during-you-placements

This was just posted by Riot support... so apparently even Riot don't know the truth about dodging in placements.

> For the record though, unlike promo series, games dodged in placements will not count as a loss out of your 10.

https://twitter.com/RiotSupport/status/953476271597670402

It's alittle confusing, but as I understand it that still holds true right? It doesn't count as a loss out of the 10, but it does count as a loss, so you lose the dodge mmr for it but not an actual placement game yeah?if it puts you to 10-1 then that loss hasn't counted out of your 10 right?
